message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $15,000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can we meet in the middle at $13,500?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While $13,500 is closer to what I had in mind, I'm still looking for a bit more.  How about we settle at $14,250?
I understand you're looking for a bit more, but I'm not comfortable going above $13,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think $13,750 is the absolute maximum I can go. Can we agree on that?
